description:
Digi.me downloads everything from your online social network accounts and stores it in a library safely tucked away on your computer. From here it's a simple click to copy photos, posts, dms, friends to your desktop. You could export your Facebook photos to your Dropbox folder, export a Twitter private message thread, or export the Instagram photos you've recently liked.

#### Commercial software

This program is free but becomes [feature limited](https://digi.me/pricing) after 30 days without a license.
summary: digi.me is a backup system for your social media.
author: digi.me Limited
